body.name: VECELO Queen Metal Platform Bed Frame with Rustic Vintage Wooden Headboard, Heavy Duty Metal Slats Support, Platform Mattress Base No Box Spring Needed, No Noise, Easy Assembly
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Thursday, February 22. Order within 9 hrs 33 mins
features: [RETRO INDUSTRIAL STYLING]--Modern-industrial headboard design features MDF wood, the contrast of wooden panels and black metal frame takes a strong rustic flair. Rustic Industrial wooden grain headboard and footboard adds better supports to your mattress.

[STURDY FOUNDATION]--This bed frame build with reliable metal frame and 14 pcs of heavy-duty metal slats, rustic Industrial wooden grain headboard and footboard adds better supports to your mattress.Weight capacity (Queen size):650 lbs.

[EXTRA STORAGE SPACE]--Our metal bed comes with 14inch under-bed clearance space for storing stuff and cleaning the underneath easily. Efficiently designed and constructed to eliminate the need for a box spring.

[MATTRESS PROTECTION & NOISE-FREE]--Strong steel slats support with center support legs prevent from mattress sliding. No squeaky when you rolling over at midnight. Plastic foot pad attached to the bottom of the bed frames for floor protection.

[EASY ASSEMBLY]--We provide all the necessary hardware and tool, and an illustrated installation manual, you can do it by myself in an hour (Mattress not included). Should you have any questions, please feel free to contact us!
body.description: VECELO Twin/Full/Queen Size Platform Bed Frame with Wood Headboard, No Box Spring NeededSturdy Foundation--This heavy duty metal bed frame build with reliable metal frame and 14 pcs of heavy-duty metal slats provides optimum support for all types of mattresses.Safe & Noise-Free--The extreme steel strength and safe design ensure durability and stability without creaking. You can enjoy a sweet sleep.High-End Headboard--The headboard of natural wood grain has unparalleled touch and texture that brings a retro and fresh atmosphere to your bedroom.Easy Assembly--We provide all the necessary hardware and tool, and an illustrated installation manual, you can do it by myself in an hour. Should you have any questions, please feel free to contact us!Specifications:Material: Wood & MetalBed Frame Color: Black & BrownHeadboard Height :40"Bed tail board Height :16.7"Slat Spacing: 5.7"Under-bed Height: 14"Max Load: 450 lb(Twin), 650 lb( Full & Queen)6"/8"/10"/12" mattresses are recommended.Package Contents:1 x Bed frame1 x Accessory Kit1 x InstructionsNotes:Please read the instruction carefully before assemblyEnsure all parts and screws are firmly attached before useIf you have any problem of the twin platform bed frame, please kindly contact our support email to get help before reviewing.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: VECELO Metal Platform Bed Frame with Rustic Wooden Headboard The metal bed frame is the perfect addition to bedrooms. It offers you optimal conditions for restful sleep and pleasant dreams. A strong & clean-lined frame that seamlessly blends with the style if just about any room. The metal frame and metal slat support any latex, spring, or memory foam mattress without the added expense of a box spring. It is easy to put all the components together, you don't even take more than an hour to assemble it.

Easy Assembly We eliminate as many nuts and bolts we can. Metal slats follow easy push assembly design. All hardware is included. Metal Frame Sturdy metal frame with outstanding weight-bearing capacity for great stability and durability. Powder Coated Surface The metal surface with powder coating resists rusts and scratches, durable for long-term use.

VECELO Twin/Full/Queen Size bed frame with Wooden Headboard, Clean Design and Easy Assembly The heavy duty metal bed frame provides optimum support for all types of mattresses without the use of box springs. The extreme steel strength and safe design ensure durability and stability without creaking. You can enjoy a sweet sleep. Each part of the bed frame is welded firmly and fixed with heavy duty screws to prevent cracking. 13.7 inches of under-bed space creates roomy space for people with storage needs.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Sturdy and beautiful
reviews.reviewText: It is very sturdy and the set up was very easy. It looks well made and well worth the price.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Sturdy and Looks Great!
reviews.reviewText: When this arrived, it looked like it would be a LOT of work trying to get it all put together. And it was. But it was pretty easy to follow the directions and all the parts (including the blots, washers and hardware) were labeled and easy locate. My wife and I had this up and ready for the mattress in about 1/2 an hour! It looks great and is very sturdy. The only thing I wasn't comfortable with was the gap between the slats. We have cats that like to dig holes in our mattresses and foundation, so I placed thin plywood down first, then the new mattress.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 30, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I purchased this bed as an inexpensive option for a guest bedroom. I was skeptical at first but the bed was easy to assemble and looks great 😊 there is no noise and it is sturdy with just one mattress

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Good for price
reviews.reviewText: For the price point this is a pretty good bedframe. The wood looks really nice and the metal finish is solid, but it is a little squeaky and the bolts didn’t all fit 100% correctly.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 22, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice at affordable price
reviews.reviewText: Attractive unit, especially like the headboard with the faux wood panel that is aesthetically pleasing. Sturdy and nicely supports the mattress w/o a box spring. Assembly is a little time consuming and best done with two people. When we need another twin bed will order this again.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 24, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Super simple to put togetherness
reviews.reviewText: I honestly can say I do no have any dislikes. It is solid and I was not expecting that small (but long) of a box but I’m so glad it came the way it did it was so so simple to put together and has extra pieces with it for screws and washers if ever needed which is nice but it looks so so nice. And definitely only need a mattress top and not a box spring because it makes it so high up with a box spring.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy, functionable, good price
reviews.reviewText: Was easy to put together, doesn't look cheap, and the price was good.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 15, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Everything about it was good the packaging to how easy it was to put together it only took me an hour to put together and it came out nice and is very sturdy

reviews.reviewTitle: Good quality and sturdy. Door step delivery is a hassle
reviews.reviewText: The assembly instructions were easy to read. My flatmate and I had a fun time assembling the bed and we're able to do that within 1-2 hr. We both have little to no knowledge of tools.The bed is of good quality and is sturdy. Just as in the pictures and description.The delivery was a hassle. The courier service was with Canada Post who didn't deliver the bed at first and I was expected to pick up the heavy package. Amazon customer service was not at all helpful. After speaking to two people at Canada Post, they were "kind enough" to agree to re attempt delivery outside of my apartment building.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on January 23, 2024
reviews.reviewText: great all around however, stands should have something softer to protect carpets
Easy to assemble, strong and fits nicely in smaller bedroom. Great value for the price

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on December 3, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Really good bed frame easy to build and really strong

This bed is absolutely gorgeous. I had read the reviews before having purchased it and I was already convinced that I did not make the wrong choice. I ordered the bed on Sunday 14th Jan '24 and the estimated delivery date was a month away which I was willing to wait.To my surprise, the next day I see that the bed had been dispatched and on Tuesday 16th as I came back from work I see the bed in front of my door so I was EXTREMELY impressed by how swift and simple the process was.I assembled the bed by myself in less than hour. Clear instructions, nothing was missing, everything was clear and very very simple and easy to follow. That night I had the best sleep I've had in ages, new bed felt like heaven and it's so aesthetically pleasing too. It's sturdy, doesn't slide or move, and can support a lot of weight as my mattress is quite thick and heavy.All in all this is the best investment I've made thus far this year and I would STRONGLY recommend and encourage you to purchase this without hesitation. It is a worthwhile investment.God bless you :)
